Returns: true if the genre is canonical, otherwise false.
Parameters: String: The name of genre to be checked.
isCanonical(java.lang.String).Description: Returns whether a given text is a canonical genre defined in @B_android#support#media#tv#TvContractCompat#Programs#Genres_E@.

Returns: an encoded genre string that can be inserted into the @B_android#support#media#tv#TvContractCompat#Programs#COLUMN_BROADCAST_GENRE_E@ or @B_android#support#media#tv#TvContractCompat#Programs#COLUMN_CANONICAL_GENRE_E@ column.
encode(java.lang.String...).Description: Encodes genre strings to a text that can be put into the database.

Parameters: String: The encoded genre string retrieved from the @B_android#support#media#tv#TvContractCompat#Programs#COLUMN_BROADCAST_GENRE_E@ or @B_android#support#media#tv#TvContractCompat#Programs#COLUMN_CANONICAL_GENRE_E@ column.
decode(java.lang.String).Description: Decodes the genre strings from the text stored in the database.
